main event: A bright white light was observed in the northwest sky by several military personnel at Eielson AFB. The object remained stationary for several minutes and then suddenly moved rapidly to the east and disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was observed through binoculars and appeared to be oval-shaped.
No sound was heard from the object.
The report was forwarded to Project Blue Book.
The object was described as a red light shaped like a saucer, about 30 feet in diameter.
The object stopped and hovered for several minutes before moving away at a very high rate of speed.
